dashboard.label: Dashboard Edit Experience
dashboard.description: Enhanced productivity in dashboard authoring and editing with a dashboard preview state and source editor improvements.

html.p: This release introduces an enhanced dashboard edit experience to make users more productive in both authoring and editing dashboards. Further, this now makes the edit experience for dashboards more consistent with other knowledge objects within Splunk.

ul.li: Preview changes before saving to the system
Supports inline validation of proper Simple XML (nodes, values, etc)
Standard IDE functionality (syntax highlighting, auto-close tags, etc)
